duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in developing a proper repair plan for each vehicle
Thoroughly disassemble, repair, and reassemble each vehicle
Repair collision damaged vehicles according to OEM specifications and company standards, including Alldata, I-CAR, and the WOW Operating Way
Attend/collaborate with team during daily production meetings
Stay up to date with required I-Car and Company Safety Training

education_certification.credential: 2-5+ years of collision repair experience minimum required
Ability to demonstrate and properly complete light to heavy repairs
I-CAR or ASE Certifications are a bonus
